response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique offering is priced at $1,200,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its worth and your potential benefit. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns and enhancing your endeavors. Should you choose to accept this offer, we can proceed with the transaction promptly. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
